attributes.action: Make each week 4 working days long, by making Wednesday a day of rest.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I think you will agree that we all work far too hard! 
Sign this petition to allow you an extra day off per week. 

Less stress equals less illness and increased productivity - so employers sign this too!!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
